author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49720

#### PR description:


Development of HLT menus for `CMSSW_16_0_X`:
   * This is the PR for the 16_0_X branch (this is the release cycle currently used for Run-3 HLT-menu development).

These updates correspond to the updates towards the first version "V1.0" of the `GRun` menu for the 2026 pp data-taking.
- Migrate all tables to use `CMSSW_16_0_0_pre4` template
- update TSG scripts to use `16_0_X`
- remove 15.1.X-based `customizeHLTforCMSSW` customization functions

In addition this PR introduces the following commit:
- 9a35ec3a1f91577275c870ad2b0bce9631e04b68 : update global tags to be used 2026 TSG tests

#### PR validation:

TSG integration tests.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49720 to the current TSG production cycle (`CMSSW_16_0_X`)
title: HLT menu development for `16_0_X` (1/N)
